 
Palambar has created a mess while prime factoring numbers. He needs your help to find the
largest prime factor of a given number..
 

Input
First line contains T the number of test cases
Each test case contains a single number N whose largest prime factor needs to be found.


Sample Input:
2
2
3

Output
Corresponding to every input, output a single number which is the required number.


Sample Output:
2
3

Constraints
T <= 100
2 <= N <= 10^9
